abstract: Claudia La Rocco reviews premiere of dance work by Congolese choreographer Faustin Linyekula, performed by Linyekula and collaborators, at the Kitchen as part of Crossing the Line festival.
snippet: The Congolese choreographer Faustin Linyekula presented his politically charged and captivating “more more more ... future” at the Kitchen.
lead_paragraph: The Congolese choreographer Faustin Linyekula presented his politically charged and captivating “more more more ... future” at the Kitchen.

headline.main: Messages From Prison to an Irresistible Beat
headline.print_headline: Messages From Prison To an Irresistible Beat
headline.seo: ‘more, more, more future’ at the Kitchen - Review
